intent_atoms.description: The ParseTree and JSON exports must always include the active preset and disabled rule identifiers for downstream consumers.
Introduce a file-backed validation configuration store to persist global defaults, workspace overrides, and propagate rule filters into ParseTreeStore snapshots.
Provide a macOS settings scene with ValidationSettingsView that allows users to select presets, toggle per-rule settings, switch scopes, and reset to global behavior.
The macOS Settings pane must correctly display preset selection, custom override labeling, and reset behavior as verified by manual QA.
CLI wiring (Task D7) must surface the same configuration metadata for full E7 coverage.

functional_units.name: Validation Preset UI Settings Integration
functional_units.description: Provides a macOS settings scene that allows users to select validation presets, toggle individual rules, switch scopes, and reset to global defaults.

functional_units.name: ParseTree Validation Metadata Plumbing
functional_units.description: Exposes active preset and disabled rule identifiers in ParseTree and JSON exports for downstream consumers.

functional_units.name: File-backed Validation Configuration Store
functional_units.description: Stores validation configuration data on disk, enabling loading and saving of global defaults, workspace overrides, and propagating rule filters into ParseTreeStore snapshots.

functional_units.name: DocumentSessionController Integration
functional_units.description: Loads and saves global defaults, manages workspace overrides, and propagates rule filters to ParseTreeStore snapshots.

functional_units.name: ValidationSettingsView UI Component
functional_units.description: UI component that presents preset selection, per-rule toggles, scope switching, and reset-to-global behavior backed by controller APIs.

functional_units.name: Workspace Session Snapshot Persistence
functional_units.description: Persists per-file validation overrides with bookmark metadata so overrides restore when documents are reopened.

functional_units.name: State Store Updates for Validation Filtering
functional_units.description: Updates state stores to support filtering, persistence, and export metadata flows across app and kit targets.
